tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE adherence_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name TEXT,
    audit_type TEXT,
    audit_date DATE,
    adherence_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AuditReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  audit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  audit_outcome VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Audits (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATE,
  audited_entity VARCHAR(100),
  audit_type ENUM('internal', 'external'),
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE AuditReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  findings TEXT,
  recommendations TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES Audits(audit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_guidelines (
  entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_description TEXT,
  date_created TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audit_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_text TEXT,
  audit_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE internal_audit_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
  audit_result TEXT,
  audit_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE external_audit_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  auditor_company VARCHAR(100),
  audit_findings TEXT,
  audit_date DATE,
  report_submitted BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE internal_audit_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  audit_date DATE,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE external_audit_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  audit_date DATE,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_guidelines (
  guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(100),
  parent_category_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATETIME,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  user_id INT
)
